author: Zeta Ret
text: RegExp XML processor to object and reversed conversion to HTML

public_methods.getFilePath: file*: String, dir: String|Boolean; return String
public_methods.loadFromFile: file*: String, dir: String|Boolean; return String
public_methods.parseFromFile: file*: String, dir: String|Boolean; return String
public_methods.domToString: dom*: Object, nowhite: Boolean, pretty: Boolean, prefix: Array; return String
public_methods.search: type*: String|Array, attr*: String, value*: String, dom: Object; return Array
public_methods.debugCase: text*: String, error: Error|Function, data: Object
public_methods.process: s*: String, d*: Object; return Object
public_methods.getClosedTag: s*: String, el*: Object; return Object
public_methods.getElement: type*: String, closed: Boolean, attr: Array|Object; return Object
public_methods.attributes: s*: String, el*: Object; return String
public_methods.attrToObject: aa*: Array, el*: Object, cursor: Number; return zetaret.node.utils.html::HTMLParser

descriptions.prettyPrefix: tag offset per depth, change to more tabs, or spaces, deleted prefix will generate elements on each line, use in `domToString`
descriptions.prettyNewLine: new line string upon creating new tag, use in `domToString`
descriptions.useAutomaton: parsing based on `automata` map, allows special tags, or define structure
descriptions.autoOrder: honor `automaton` order or html of parsing `automata` tags
descriptions.closeTags: skip parsing elements and lookup to close the tag directly, i.e. `script` or `style`

HTMLParser.this: Parse simple XML structures into templates, swap content, or use HTMLCache, no support of comments `<!--` or special tags `<!` `<?`. Must extend and override methods to supplement, or use multiple templates to create more complex HTML structure.

getFilePath.this: resolves using path and base directory
getFilePath.file: relative or absolute path to file, will merge with dir
getFilePath.dir: `true` uses `file` as it is, without `path.resolve` or local/remote directory

search.this: query the dom per type of element, and/or attribute key and value

process.this: implemented for performance, use strict tagging and closures

getTag.this: detect any tag opener before processing attributes and closure

getAutoTag.this: check current detected tag opener for an `automaton` implementation

getElement.this: generate new object element and append to any dom structure
